title: CASSIOPEIA LOST HER WARDING QUOTE ONCE AGAIN
body: Cassiopeia lost her warding quotes since the mage update  . Thanks to fix the issue for the next patch .

replies.body:
Hey Nαgma - 

Thanks for the report! Unfortunately, this isn't something we'll have fixed for the next patch, as we're already preparing the build. However, it's now on the radar to resolve. ^-^
